/wwiwilljoin.description: During the registration period, players can register to join the game by using this command.

/wwiwillview.description: Players who only want to spectate can register by using this command.

/wwremoveyourselffromgame.description: During the registration period, players can cancel their registration to join the game by using this command.

/wwchannel.description: Start a channel and automatically invite all moderators and Dolfje.

/wwinvitemoderators.description: Invites all moderators to join the channel where this command is executed.

/wwinviteplayers.description: Invites everyone in the game. To prevent mistakes from happening, this command has to be executed with the rgument ikweethetzeker.

/wwlist.description: Returns a list of everybody in the current channel..

/wwrules.description: Shows the current set of rules.

/wwstartquickvote.description: Creates a vote that is not stored in the database. This vote can be created and closed by anybody.

/wwlotto.description: Dolfje will give you some voting advice. He will pick a random living player, which could be you as well!

/wwstatus.description: Displays the current status of the game, and shows in which games you are active (as moderator, player or spectator).

/wwsummarize.description: Gives a simmary of the channel where the command is executed.

/wwhelp.description: Send a DM with the help text.

/wwstartregistration.description: The game always starts with opening the registration.

/wwstartgame.description: End the registration period and start the game.

/wwstartvoteround.description: Start the voting round. This command has to be executed in the voting channel.

/wwvotereminder.description: Send a reminder during the voting round.

/wwstopvoteround.description: Stop the active voting round. This commands has to be executed in the voting channel.

/wwdead.description: This command marks a player as dead.

/wwrevive.description: This command marks a player as alive.

/wwstopgame.description: Stops the game and opens the choice menu for all channels in the voting channel.

/wwarchive.description: Archives all channels that are related to the game.

/wwgiveroles.description: Distributes the roles. This commands takes the roles as arguments. You have to end with the standard role, without a numer or with a number range.
